Step Description: Open application URL: https://auth.uat.pluginlive.com/
Expected Result: Login page is displayed with email and password fields

Step Description: Enter valid email in the email textfield
Enter valid password in the password textfield
Click the 'Agree to terms and conditions' checkbox
Click the Login button
Wait for redirect to Dashboard
Expected Result: Dashboard is visible within 15 seconds. URL contains /dashboard

Test Case Title: Navigate to My Resume from Dashboard
Precondition: User logged in and Dashboard visible
Step Description: Verify Dashboard page is fully loaded

Test Case Title: Navigate to My Resume from Dashboard
Precondition: User logged in and Dashboard visible
Step Description: Click 'My Resume' button on Dashboard

Test Case Title: Navigate to My Resume from Dashboard
Precondition: User logged in and Dashboard visible
Step Description: Verify all section icons are visible
Expected Result: Personal Info, Education, Internship, Certificate, Project, Work Experience icons visible

Step Description: Click Personal Information icon
Close the modal
Repeat click for Education icon
Repeat for Internship / Certificate / Project / Work Experience
Expected Result: Each icon opens its corresponding section modal

Test Case Title: Fill Personal Info - Anywhere + Valid Address
Step Description: Click Additional Information icon

Test Case Title: Fill Personal Info - Anywhere + Valid Address
Step Description: Handle location preference: If AnyWhere/JobLocation = 'Anywhere' then click Anywhere checkbox. If 'JobLocation' then fill preferred location textfield (Eg.Chennai)
Expected Result: Location preference is set based on Excel data

Test Case Title: Fill Personal Info - Anywhere + Valid Address
Step Description: Click on Country textfield dropdown and type to search. Select matching country

Test Case Title: Fill Personal Info - Anywhere + Valid Address
Step Description: Click on State textfield dropdown (cascades from Country) and type to search. Select matching state
Expected Result: State is selected. State options filtered by Country

Test Case Title: Fill Personal Info - Anywhere + Valid Address
Step Description: Click on City textfield dropdown (cascades from State) and type to search. Select matching city
Expected Result: City is selected. City options filtered by State

Test Case Title: Fill Personal Info - Anywhere + Valid Address
Step Description: Click Pincode textfield. Clear existing value. Type 6-digit pincode

Test Case Title: Fill Personal Info - Anywhere + Valid Address
Step Description: Click 'Same as Permanent Address' checkbox
Expected Result: Communication address auto-copied from permanent address

Test Case Title: Fill Personal Info - Anywhere + Valid Address
Step Description: Click Update button
Expected Result: Data saved. Modal closes within 3 seconds

Step Description: Click Additional Information icon
AnyWhere/JobLocation = 'JobLocation'. Click preferred location textfield (span text 'Eg.Chennai'). Type location name. Select from dropdown
Fill Country / State / City / Pincode as TC-3.1 steps 3-6
Click Update button
Click Education section icon
Click on Board textfield dropdown. Type board name. Select matching option
Click on Year textfield dropdown. Select passing year
Click Percentage textfield. Enter percentage value (0-100)
Click Qualification 12th button to expand path selector
Select '12th' option from path selector
Expected Result: 12th fields become visible. Diploma fields hidden

Step Description: Click on Board textfield dropdown. Type board name. Select matching option
Click on Year textfield dropdown. Select year (must be after 10th year)
Click Percentage textfield. Enter percentage (0-100)
Click Update button
Click Qualification 12th button to expand path selector
Select 'Diploma' option from path selector
Expected Result: Diploma fields become visible. 12th fields hidden

Step Description: Click State textfield dropdown. Type and select state
Click City textfield dropdown (cascades from State). Type and select city
Click College textfield dropdown. Type and select college
Wait for Institution Name textfield to appear after college selection. Enter institution name
Click Year textfield dropdown. Select diploma passing year
Click Marks Type dropdown. Select 'Percentage'
Enter percentage value in Percentage textfield (0-100)
Click Degree textfield dropdown. Type and select degree
Click Department textfield dropdown. Type and select department
Click Update button
Fill State / City / College / Institution / Year as TC-6.2 steps 1-5
Click Marks Type dropdown. Select 'CGPA'
Enter CGPA value (must be ≤ scale value)
Enter CGPA Scale (Out Of) value
Fill Degree and Department. Click Update
Click Internship section icon
Click 'Add Internship' button
Click Role textfield dropdown. Type and select role
Click Company textfield dropdown. Type and select company
Click Function textfield dropdown. Type and select function
Click Industry textfield dropdown. Type and select industry
If Industry = 'Other': Enter custom industry text in Industry Text textfield
Click Start Date month-year picker. Select year then month
Click End Date month-year picker. Select year then month (must be ≥ Start Date)
Click Skills multi-select dropdown. Type skill name. Select at least 1 skill
Click Update button
Click Certificate section icon
Click 'Add Certification' button
Click Organization/Institute textfield dropdown. Type and select institute
Click Course Title textfield. Enter course name
Click Start Date picker. Select start year and month
Click End Date picker. Select end year and month (must be ≥ Start Date)
Click Skills multi-select dropdown. Type and select at least 1 skill
Click Submit button
Click Project section icon
Click 'Add Project' button
Click Project Title textfield. Enter project name
Click Company textfield (optional). Enter company name or leave empty
Click Start Date picker. Select start year and month
Click End Date picker. Select end year and month (must be ≥ Start Date)
Click Skills multi-select dropdown. Type and select at least 1 skill
Click Submit button
Click Work Experience section icon
Click 'Add Work Experience' button
Click Role textfield dropdown. Type and select role
Click Company textfield dropdown. Type and select company
Click Function textfield dropdown. Type and select function
Click Industry textfield dropdown. Type and select industry
If Industry = 'Other': Enter custom industry text in Industry Text textfield
Click Start Date month-year picker. Select year then month
Click End Date month-year picker. Select year then month (must be ≥ Start Date)
Click Employment Type dropdown. Select 'Full-time' or 'Part-time'
Click Job Title textfield. Enter job title
Click Skills multi-select dropdown. Type and select at least 1 skill
Click Submit button
Login → Dashboard → My Resume (TC-1.1 + TC-2.1)
Fill Personal Information (TC-3.1)
Fill 10th + 12th Education (TC-4.1 + TC-5.2)
Fill Internship (TC-7.1)
Fill Certificate (TC-8.1)
Fill Project (TC-9.1)
Fill Work Experience (TC-10.1)

Fill Personal Information (TC-3.1)

Step Description: Fill any section with valid data and click Update/Submit
Observe time from login redirect to Dashboard visible
Click any textfield dropdown. Type partial text
Expected Result: Dropdown filters options matching typed text

Step Description: Save a section. Close modal. Reopen the same section
